sources.title: Wings of Adventure (1930) REX LEASE
sources.description:
Stars: Rex Lease, Armida, Clyde Cook
Director: Richard Thorpe

An American aviator and his mechanic are forced to make an emergency landing in Mexico. They fall into the hands of a bandit who wants to overthrow the government and become the ruler of a new republic.

sources.title: Wings Of Adventure 1930 Rex Lease, Armida, Clyde Cook, Fred Malatesta
sources.description: Wings Of Adventure 1930 Rex Lease, Armida, Clyde Cook, Fred Malatesta

metadata.Plot: An American aviator and his mechanic are forced to make an emergency landing in Mexico. They fall into the hands of a bandit who wants to overthrow the government and become the ruler of a new republic. The bandit's henchman forces the two Americans to commit a robbery, only for the two men to be caught and arrested by the government.
